title: Who's boss
creator_credit: Irving Jacoby, Affiliated Film Producers and Alexander Hammid
brief_description: Deals with the struggle between a young married couple to attain a balance of power in their relationship. Both are successful in their repsective careers, yet unable to make a success of their marriage. After two years of conflict and a serious quarrel, they decide to make a determined cooperative effort to salvage their marriage. Although adjustment is slow and difficult, they ultimately acheive a balance that enables both of them to contribute equally to ‘breadwinning’ and ‘homemaking’. Neither is boss both both partners share the reponsibilities of the home.
